CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Flash Newspicture Magazine, December 1, 1938, pg. 24, reads: "Centenarian - 102 year-old Mrs. Carolina Meyers (below, right), of Pittsburg [Pittsburgh], Pa., active and healthy, poses with five generations of Meyers.  L. to R., standing, Mrs. Ella Pryor, Mrs. S. Carolina Cox, of Atlantic City, Mrs. Issac [Isaac] Simms.  The centenarian is seated. Little Howard Simms is on the right."
TitMainTitle: Ella Pryor, S. Carolina Cox, Isaac Simms, and Howard Simms gathered around centenarian Carolina Meyers, in living room
